title: [SRE/SRA Recruiting] [High + Low Elo Players Wanted!]
body:
Hello everyone,
I'm sure by now you guys all know what I usually type here so I'll get onto what I'm looking for;
 A Gold 3 + - Platinum top laner.
 1-2 Gold Player that can play most positions well.
 A Bronze - Silver Jungler for Academy team. 
If you meet any of these requirements or are interested in helping out with the team please don't hesitate to contact me at:
Discord: SRA Kekzii#1194
LoL IGN: Mr Zeroxs
Shaco Only Account: Cxnt of a Clown

Thank you all and I look forward to hearing from some of you soon!
~ SRA Kekzii, Manager of Storm Raisers Esports.

replies.body:
Hi Kekzii,

i have added you in game, i am a plat 5 jungle/top main. i do not play much top anymore but i wouuld love to give it a chance to see if i would fit into what youre looking for as a top laner
